testsuite.name: com.ultimateqa.courses.testsuite.LoginPageTest
testsuite.system-out: Clicking on Signin Button [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (2e9a7ef43e7e702b27d8e6ed28677468)] -> xpath: //a[contains(text(),'Sign In')]] Enter user name abc@gmail.com to username field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (2e9a7ef43e7e702b27d8e6ed28677468)] -> id: user[email]] Enter user name abc123 to username field [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (2e9a7ef43e7e702b27d8e6ed28677468)] -> name: user[password]] Clicking on Login Button [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (2e9a7ef43e7e702b27d8e6ed28677468)] -> xpath: //button[contains(text(),'Sign in')]] The error message is[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (2e9a7ef43e7e702b27d8e6ed28677468)] -> xpath: //li[contains(text(),'Invalid email or password.')]] Click to see screenshot Screenshot
